value: All fields required unless marked as 'optional'
There is a new version of Arlo available.  Please upgrade now to access your account.
Your credit card is about to expire, please update it now to enjoy uninterrupted service.
Confirm your email to receive motion alert
The base station will be assigned to your account.  Please make sure you are connected to the same LAN as the base station so we can discover the base station for you.
Pick the time zone according to where your base station is located.
Your password must be at least 6 characters long - and must contain one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number.  These characters are also permitted: !@#$%^&*()
If you ever ask us to call you, we'll use this number.  It may also help us find your account if you call customer support.  But it's optional, of course.
Pick this if you want your subscription to auto renew.
We'll automatically remove (non-favorite) files for you after 7 days - to effectively use your cloud storage.
Pick this if you want to be notified when you've used 80% of your cloud storage.
You can mount your camera upside down if necessary, and then pick this option to invert the image to match.
Use this when placing your camera.  We limit the delay to help you see near real-time what your camera is seeing.
Use this when placing your camera.  Instead of recording video when it detects motion, it will flash its status LED at you.
Set rules to customize how your videos are recorded and optionally send the recordings to yourself or others.
You are not connected to the Internet. Please check your connection.
We're sorry, Arlo is currently unavailable. We'll be back up and running in {time}.

We cannot set up your account at this time as we cannot detect your base station.

Please make sure your base station is powered on and connected to the Internet, make sure your device is connected to the same WiFi network as the base station.

Only 4 cameras can be streamed concurrently. Please stop another camera stream before you start this camera stream.
Rebooting is not allowed if any camera is busy.

Passwords must be at least 6 characters and may NOT contain these characters:  /, \, |, <, >, : (colon), ; (semicolon), and the apostrophe character "'".

For your first base station, you should select the same channel as your Wi-Fi router.  Additional base stations placed in the same location/building should be physically separated by 20 feet or more, and should be put on different channels.

o Put batteries in your camera. Be sure to follow the polarity indications

o Press the 'sync' button on both the camera and the Base Station

o A light on the front of the camera will flash rapidly for 10 seconds to confirm the sync - then turn off

o The light on the Base Station under the Camera icon will turn green
An update is available for your base station '{baseStationName}'. Do you want to update now?
Your Arlo app requires an update to continue.
A new version of the Arlo app is available.

Arlo detected motion on {cameraName}. Click here to view the recording.
Click on 'Select' at the top right to see more you can do with your recordings.

Use Rules to set up and manage motion detection, recordings and alerts. Group one or more rules using Modes.

Modes can then be selected or scheduled to determine what rules are enabled.

Congratulations! Your Arlo Cameras are now setup and ready for viewing.
Arlo is smart to automatically save each video it records into your cloud storage account. Learn More to find out how long your cloud account stores each video, how many cameras you can connect and what subscription options you have.
